elements.name: panel1
elements.title: What do the following insurances cover?

elements.name: question1
elements.title: 1. health insurance
elements.correctAnswer: Health insurance covers medical costs: doctor's fees, hospital costs, costs of necessary examinations, medication.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: 2. hail insurance
elements.correctAnswer: Hail insurance covers the costs of hail damage, e.g. loss of earnings due to spoiled vegetables.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: 3. life insurance
elements.correctAnswer: Life insurance pays a predetermined amount of money to the surviving dependants of the deceased.
